settings.title: How much is Shipping?
settings.text: We offer free fully insured express shipping via UPS for all Jewelry purchases. Due to the nature of products, we require direct signature delivery.

settings.title: How long does it take to ship my order?
settings.text: Each item is either In-Stock or Made-to-Order. In-stock items ship within two (2) business days after your order. Made-to-Order items take approximately 15 business days (3-4 weeks) to create, and then ship to you.

settings.title: Do you offer Discrete Shipping?
settings.text: Yes, all of our packages ship in an unmarked , unbranded UPS Express Box!

settings.title: Where Can orders be Shipped?
settings.text: Stienhardt ships to residences, offices, and local FedEx/UPS locations. We do not ship to PO Boxes for security reasons. If you wish to have your ring held at a local UPS store, please email care@stienhardt.com after your order is placed to process that change.

settings.title: I need my ring in a Rush. What can I do?
settings.text: Deadline? No problem, we can rush certain rings to meet your deadline. Please call us at +1 917-909-6402 or email care@stienhardt.com to confirm the feasibility.

settings.title: Are there extra Taxes/Duties for international Shipping?
settings.text: Yes, jewelry and loose gemstones are subject to VAT and duties for international orders. These fees are not collected by our company and are instead directly collected at the point of delivery. Learn more here
